name: Marwan (ECJam5)
description:
WARNING!

Unfortunately, there's a bug in the game. It may or not happen depending on the path of dialogue you choose. You will be able to keep playing but the story won't have much sense. If you'd like to play the unbugged version is here, but of course this is the version you should qualify.

Argument:

You play the role of Marwan's father, a young boy who had to live war and immigration through the ocean, as so many refugees nowadays.

This is a text-based game, while you drive the boat to Europe.

Languages:

English and Spanish.

Controls:

WAD -> Boat.

Arrows /Mouse wheel -> change text.

Space / Enter / Middle mouse button -> select text.

3D Assets (Royalty Free License)

3D Inflatable boat:

https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/free-max-mode-inflatable-boats/211427

People:

https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/1387761
